resources.string:
"Island" is a sandbox environment to clone selected apps and isolate them from accessing your personal data outside the sandbox (including call logs, contacts and etc). (SMS as an exception is accessible)

Isolated app can be frozen on demand, with launcher icon vanished and its background behaviors completely blocked.

To start the sandbox, we need to build the island first.

Android for Work is already set up on your device by \"%1$s\". Due to the limitation of Android system, Island cannot coexist with it. If you proceed, the existent profile WITH ALL ITS DATA WILL BE REMOVED.
If anything goes wrong during the setup procedure, you can always remove all the data created by Island via \"Settings - Account - Remove work profile\".

Island will now launch the Android installer to \"install\" this app in Island.\n\nAlthough it looks like the regular installation, actually it takes no extra storage space but just activates this app in Island. Thus the \"installation\" will finish instantly.
Island was accidentally deactivated, please grant this manual Device Admin request to re-activate.

Are you sure you want to destroy the whole Island?

You will LOSE ALL THE DATA IN ISLAND.

Apps and data outside Island will NOT be affected.
Are you sure to deactivate Island?\n\nYou have to go through the setup flow again to bring it back.
Failed to destroy Island. Please try removing it in system \"Settings - Accounts - Remove work profile\".
